text: Giuseppe Spinelli (21 November 1908 – 17 January 1987) was an Italian politician. He was born in Cremona. He was mayor of Milan. He was a supporter of the Italian Social Republic. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1987 deaths Category:20th-century Italian politicians Category:People of the Italian Social Republic Category:Mayors of Milan
title: Giuseppe Spinelli (politician)
